decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 09/08/2024.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 09/08/2021 [LBI ref: P2020/1877/FUL). Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
description:
Section 73 application to vary condition 2 of planning permission reference P2020/1877/FUL, allowed on appeal ref: APP/V5570/W/20/3261672 dated 09/08/2021: 
'Redevelopment of existing building including erection of single-storey roof-level office pavilion, replacement of existing facade, repositioning of office entrance, reconfiguration of retail/office unit layout at ground floor, and flexible office/leisure (Class B1/D2) floorspace at ground and lower ground level, installation of internal mezzanine infills to existing office atrium area, creation of a roof terrace area, installation of green roof, replacement of rooftop plant and associated works'. 

The amendments are to allow an increased cycling parking provision (from 144 spaces to 180 spaces, plus 4 spaces for accessible cycles spaces and 8 lockers for folding bicycles), the addition of changing facilities, increased planting at Level 08, alterations to the retail and pavilion facades and other minor design and layout changes.
